[Function] uri=

Signature

uri= uri1 uri2 => boolean

Package

ystok.uri

Arguments
uri1. uri2
Instances of the uri structure class.
Values

Generalized Boolean.

Description

The function determines the equivalence of the URIs based on string comparison.

A better scheme dependent comparison is not implemented.
